entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0102.9543] Gesamtergebnis with a value of 509,400,000 is not equal to the combined total of Gewinn (Verlust) and Sonstiges Ergebnis ( 480,000,000 + 29,300,000 ) with a value of 509,300,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome fact are: Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Gesamtergebnis : 1 Decimals of Gewinn (Verlust) : 1 Decimals of Sonstiges Ergebnis : 1
Rule Element Id:9543 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900S9YO2JHTIIDG38/2021-12-31/ESEF/AT/1/bawaggroup-2021-12-31-de.zip/bawaggroup-2021-12-31-de/reports/bawaggroup-2021-12-31-de.xhtml 4465

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - Gewinn (Verlust) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. bawaggroup:AdministrativeExpenses, ifrs-full:InterestRevenueCalculatedUsingEffectiveInterestMethod, ifrs-full:ImpairmentLossImpairmentGainAndReversalOfImpairmentLossDeterminedInAccordanceWithIFRS9, ifrs-full:LossesArisingFromDerecognitionOfFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtAmortisedCost, ifrs-full:GainsArisingFromDerecognitionOfFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtAmortisedCost, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:DepreciationAndAmortisationExpense All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 01 - Gewinn (Verlust) includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax of 600,400,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 600,500,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of 1. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax that should add to 600,400,000 are comprised of the following:
- GainsAndLossesOnFinancialAssetsAndLiabilities -11,300,000 + NetInterestIncome 938,300,000 - RiskCosts 95,000,000 + FeeAndCommissionIncomeExpense 282,100,000 - OperatingExpense 490,100,000 - OtherExpenseByNature 248,200,000 + OtherIncome 198,300,000 + ShareOfProfitLossOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod 3,800,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 01 - Gewinn (Verlust). If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax Total Value : 600,400,000 Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : 1 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900S9YO2JHTIIDG38/2021-12-31/ESEF/AT/1/bawaggroup-2021-12-31-de.zip/bawaggroup-2021-12-31-de/reports/bawaggroup-2021-12-31-de.xhtml 4464
